result.execSummary:
The defendant Courtney A. Thundercloud was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/ Intent-THC(>200-1000g) [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)2.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: AODA, treatment and counseling all per agent.  DNA sample to be provided.
AODA, treatment and counseling all per agent.
Upon successful completion of probation, record may be expunged, 973.015.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Courtney A. Thundercloud in court with attorney Jesse Lee Leichsenring.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and appearances.  Atty Leichsenring states agreement.  State agrees.  Atty Leichsenring enters NC plea.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  DE advised of voting rights/felony firearm warnings.  State makes statement.  Atty Leichsenring makes statement on behalf of DE.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.

Ct 1:  NC
Probation for 2 years
Conditions of probation:
$518.00 costs/surcharges to be paid per agent during term of probation
DNA sample to be provided
AODA/Treatment and counseling per agent
Obtain/maintain full-time employment and/or education per agent
Expungment to be done upon successful completion of probation
DE to report to P&P today

Defendant Courtney A. Thundercloud in court with attorney Jesse Lee Leichsenring.  Sue Mueller and Rick S. appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State gives status.  Matter is resolved, reset for plea/sentencing set out.  Bond continues.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 21, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Atty Leichsenring acknowledges rec. information, waives reading.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalites.  Atty Leichsenring stands mute but states matter is resolved.  Court enters Not Guilty plea- Set for Trial.  Bond continued.

Defendant Courtney A. Thundercloud in court with attorney Jesse Lee Leichsenring.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and parties state appearances.  Atty Leichsenring notes DE will waive her right to prelim today.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause and binds over.

Pre-trial conference at 04-24-2015 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing at 05-08-2015 09:30 am.

Defendant Courtney A. Thundercloud in court with attorney Jesse Lee Leichsenring.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is not resolved.  Request preliminary hearing today and another PTC.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 24, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 8, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Return date on March 27, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Courtney A. Thundercloud in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court questions DE re: where her attorney is.  DE doesn't know why he's not here/she tried to reach him but couldn't find him.  Court resets.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for March 27, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
